Pre-Game Insights: The Denver Nuggets went 57-25 overall, 10-6 in Northwest Division play and 33-8 at home a season ago.
The Utah Jazz shot 46.7% from the field and 35.4% from 3-point range last season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Denver Nuggets averaged 7.1 steals, 5.6 blocks and 11.8 turnovers per game last season.
Utah finished 31-51 overall and 5-11 in Northwest Division play during the 2023-24 season.
Others: Denver and Utah square off for conference matchup
INJURIES: Nuggets: Vlatko Cancar: day to day (ankle), Aaron Gordon: day to day (knee), DaRon Holmes II: out for season (achilles).
Jazz: Lauri Markkanen: day to day (back), Taylor Hendricks: out for season (fibula), Isaiah Collier: day to day (hamstring)
